Reviews.Title: I really wanted to keep it...
Reviews.Author: J. L. Knight "JohnLKnight"
Reviews.Content: This is a very attractive camera, with lots of cool features and very good screen. However, the core function of a camera, for me, is to take pictures, and in this respect the Z20fd failed.I am not a `novice' user, but nor am I an expert. I don't even have the best eyesight in the world. I do not expect perfection from such a well priced product. However, it was clear to me from the outset that the picture quality on this camera was poor. Such was the good quality of the screen that I could tell without even downloading the pictures, that they were not good. When I downloaded them, they all clearly lacked definition and wereoverexposed. This was a couple of trial shots taken around the house and garden. I couldn't believe it! I therefore took a series of identical shots (on identical settings) with the Z20fd and my cheap old pocket Olympus (D-435). When the pictures were compared side-by-side, I was surprised to find that the Olympus was obviously better. I then showed the pictures to my wife, without telling her what camera took the pictures, and in every case she thought the Olympus was better.All the professional reviews of this camera agree that its picture quality is rubbish. I ignored them as I don't regard myself as expert enough to see or care about the imperfections they find. Instead, I decided to go with the all the positive feedback left here.Regrettably, I sent the Z20fd back and am looking for another camera. In the meantime I'll stick with my old Olympus. As I said, I am not one who expects the earth for a dime. I really wanted this snazzy little camera. But ultimately, it can't take a decent picture.(The reason I'm giving it two stars instead of one, is that it has loads of cool features and a good screen, so good, in fact, I immediately saw how crap it's pictures were.)

Reviews.Title: My niece loved it!
Reviews.Author: Ken E.
Reviews.Content: This camera was a birthday present to my 13 year old niece.  I work as a photographer AND as a representative for a competing camera manufacturer, so I was extremely sceptical that this camera would be suitable.My nieces eyes lit up when she opened the gift, and to my surprise she was able to use it immediately (the battery was charged at the factory?).She took dozens of pictures at her party, and didn't seem to have any problems with lag time, 'hunting' focus, or exposure problems that would be evident with most other cameras in the unusual lighting conditions where her party was held.Most importantly, it was easy to use.  She started using it immediately, which means that she didn't read the instruction book.  She got a lot of great, fun photos, and was able to view 'em right away without the need of instructions.

Reviews.Title: Looks like a toy, shoots like pro.
Reviews.Author: M. McCaffrey
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera expecting a decent product, and it has turned out to be an excellent one.  It takes great pictures, and they're beautiful when printed.  It has a lot of features including many shooting modes, face detection technology, etc that make this camera a bargain!  Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Impressive!
Reviews.Author: W. B. Scallions "Blue"
Reviews.Content: Not just impressive, but very much so. I like the colors, the looks, the MP and even the zoom is amazing for 3x.My only minor complaint is that of the slight delay on picture taking. If you are looking to capture a spur of the moment shot, you better allow yourself a couple seconds. (You should have a SLR or something for such anyway.)The camera's pictures are very fine on a computer screen, and the elimination of red eye is an awesome perk. The software that comes with the device isn't needed to get the pictures from the camera, but it is free and there, so what the heck.Movie quality is good, not Blue Ray (of course) but helps capture those moments when you forget your video camera. These videos can range in size depending on your memory card.The accessories are cheap (most of them) and I must advise you on getting a nice large memory card for extra pictures or movies space.All in all, Fujifilm does not dissapoint. I can't wait to get out in the woods with mine.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: M. Adams
Reviews.Content: I got this camera to take simple photos. I'm a middle schooler so I don't need a professional camera.First of all i absolutely love the color(ice blue).When i got the camera and started messing around with it the pictures were ok. However, after switching the flash off the pictures were great!The image looks semi-grainy on the screen, but after you capture the photo it's fine.There's loads of settings and the video is great too. Just make sure you have the right flash.Great camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: Working class guy "Dan"
Reviews.Content: Great camera!  I needed a camera for my upcoming New Zealand vacation. I wanted a simple point and shoot inexpensive camera. After reading some online reviews this camera seemed to stand out as meeting or exceeding the expectations of previous buyers. I must fully agree! Amazon did an amazing job getting it to me in the color I wanted for much less than my local big box store. It arrived in two days! A brief battery charge, a quick read of the get started guide, and I felt ready! The camera performed flawlessly over the course of my hiking vacation. It didn't even need charging each day. I took hundreds of pictures and some video clips. The only disapointing pictures were opperator fault. I didn't let the camera finish auto focus and forced the picture, which resulted in a bit blury photo. I also had the bad habbit of having my finger partway over the corner lenz in some photos. Also I took a few video clips with the camera turned sideways and now I can't rotate the movie clips. None of this is the camera's fault. I was amazed at the crisp clarity of the 10 megapixal photos, the ease of using the zoom and face recognition. The presets of landscape and nighttime worked great.  A great value! My camera got damp on the outside a few times taking photos of waterfalls and during rain. It didn't seem to bother it at all. The size and weight make it an ez take along for any occasion. It can take either SD or XD cards. I used a 2GB XD and didn't come close to filling it. Software seems very easy to use, to work with and store your photos.

Reviews.Title: Best. Camera. Ever
Reviews.Author: N. Mcafee "Kansas is Fun!"
Reviews.Content: Only two complaints. The blue was $12 cheaper than the green - I'd have rather gotten the Wasabi Green one but didn't feel it truly justfied th extra $.  And the shutter keeps accidently sliding open in my purse, and I have to be very careful when inserting it in my camera case for the same reason.  Could use some sort of "Latch."But other than that it's a really great camera.  Incredibly easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great little "pocket camera" for those unexpected moments...
Reviews.Author: Paula Smithmacdonald
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera to carry around. I love taking quick photos of things that catch my eye, easy snapshots of the puppy or the horses in the neighborhood, the landscape, the reservoir on the way to work where the swans love to float....great camera for the cost...and very simple to use.

Reviews.Title: I like Fuji Finepix.
Reviews.Author: K. Triplett "KLTriplett"
Reviews.Content: I bought my Fujifilm Finepix Z20fd to upgrade from a Finepix F440 with only 4.1 pixels and fewer features.  The F440 has been a great camera and I will keep it for a second camera.  Both cameras are very small and easily fit into my purse.  I like to have a camera with me at all times.  You never know when you may see a great shot.  Most of my photos are from travel and kids.  The photos are super.  I like the Face Detection and Red-Eye Removal features.  The videos are great, too.  This is a great little camera.  I recommend it.  I have owned Canon cameras before but am extremely satisfied with Fujipix.

Reviews.Title: Very good camera for a great price
Reviews.Author: Cassie
Reviews.Content: My dad bought my mom the last version of this camera and she loved it so much she bought me one....I loved that one so much I just bought my boyfriend one for Christmas. We exchanged early and he loves it...it even takes great movies! The picture quality is very good and its so easy to use! My whole family loves the fugifilm finepix camera line. My mom and I have had ours for about a year now and we havent had any problems....I deffinatly reccomend this camera!

Reviews.Title: A Great Little Camera for Lab use,
Reviews.Author: Michael Micro "Embedded Guru"
Reviews.Content: Pro:1) Takes good outdoor pictures to limit of lens resolution.2) Survived Drop to pavement before I obtained a neck lanyard.3) Good battery life in a Lowepro Ridge 10 Case.4) Excellent close up capability for taking pictures ofSurface Mount PCB's with Excellent Resolution.5) Excellent rendition of photographed text in Text mode.6) Excellent general Engineering use for bright easily incorporated illustrative report pictures.7) Has a mode that works for everything. Easily accessed close up!8) Excellent review magnification to ensure text or point of interest is sharp!9) Easily picks up every pixel on a LCD Screen.Con:1) Auto is slow and does not work for engineering (few faces). Focus in Auto seldom does what I want.  Focus and hold (while button half depressed is not supported)2) No Neck Strap just wrist strap!  (it's hard to buy a neck strap that does not have metal on it that would scratch the LCD. Amazon please stock a standard neck strap for phones and cameras that has a plastic joint from neck strap to short securing cord).3) Has a hard time photographing a CRT.4) Does not come with LCD protector (buy a pack of 5 Targus ones from Walmart)5) No Viewfinder.But I like it for work!  Each image is 2Mbytes buy at least a 2Gbyte SD card.  It takes SDHC cards as well.  Works well with openSuSE 11.0 Linux.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Camera
Reviews.Author: Robert Williamson "magickal princess shopper"
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing camera! I thoroughly researched my options before choosing this one & I'm glad I did. It was easy to learn how to use which was something I was looking for in a camera along with the color selection offered. This is a camera I highly recommend if you want something basic rather than complex. Don't worry about the picture quality as is clean, clear, & crisp. And a bonus I found is that when travelling in a car going around 60mph the pics turn out just as beautiful just as if you were standing still & the object was stationary.

Reviews.Title: amazing
Reviews.Author: samantha
Reviews.Content: i dont know what these people rating this camera a 1 or 2 are talking about. the camera is great. for real. you just have to have common sense. they all keep saying that the pics are blurry..and grainy and flash it too bright. you can turn the flash down. one setting it flashes like really bright kinda twice at once if that makes sense. and the lower flash just flashes normal. and with the blurriness. the button is meant to be pushed half way down to focus and then the rest the way to capture the pic. it takes amazing pictures! i had mine for a few months and someone threw my purse in the floor and it wasn't in a case and the screen cracked..i miss it. I've never seen another camera i like as much. so dont listen to the bad reviews...these people just dont know how to use the camera. buy this camera and make sure u get a hard shell case in the event someone decides to throw it lol

Reviews.Title: 2nd time buyer
Reviews.Author: S. Roth "incredimom3"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my 13 year old daughter.  We had purchased the same camera for our 15 year old last year and she found it easy to use and very reliable.

Reviews.Title: Fugifilm camera Z20fd
Reviews.Author: LC crawford "Busy Mom"
Reviews.Content: This camera takes nice pictures and has many features to choose from.  I do not like how long it takes to go through the pictures after I have taken them. All together it is a very good camera for taking and capturing memories.

Reviews.Title: Good and easy to use
Reviews.Author: blossomkiss
Reviews.Content: This is a cool camera. It is easy to use, simple and looks very nice too. Picture quality is good as well.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Camera
Reviews.Author: D. Hamilton "Don H."
Reviews.Content: Great small Camera- Can fit into shirt pocket. I use a Nikon D90 most of the time but now I wanted something small and I looked at a lot of cameras and read reviews. I think I made a Good choice. I especially like being able to add voice to the Pictures. Especially if you traveling to a lot of different places. Also it has one button for pictures and another button for video.The built in zoom works good and you can  also zoom in and out while taking the same clip without loss of quality. The pictures are very sharp-Not like the Nikon D90 but very nice and sharp. The settings are easy to figure out without even looking at the book. For the price I don't think you can go wrong. It also has a build in Zoom so you don't have to worry about it getting stuck in or out. The camera turns on fast and develops pics very fast.

Reviews.Title: Impressed
Reviews.Author: Tiffany
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera. It's compact and really easy to use. & not to mention takes awesome pictures. The only problem I have with this camera is you can't use the zoom function while in movie mode, but other than that it's highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Fuji Camera Blue
Reviews.Author: Osvaldo Font
Reviews.Content: This camera is awesome.  Really easy and I love the slide on slide off feature.  They should get Mister Miagi to do the commercials.

Reviews.Title: Ideal Camera
Reviews.Author: V. Verdekal "Why not?"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for daughter because the lens does not extend when focusing and therefore much more likely she will not break it.  So far very good.  The video is very good and the pictures superb. I admit I don't have the golden eye but every one in my family is pleased.  A large viewer is a bonus as is the bright blue color.A definite buy.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: GORDON "gofivehds"
Reviews.Content: bought this for a gift,we opened it and within minutes were taking pics. she had the whole thing down in 15 minutes or so after reading the directions.not crazy hard to figure out and very good display. I had a fuji, then bought a kodak and wish everytime I would have gotten another fuji. Fujis are so much easier to maneuver on the computer,easy upload, easy transfer. kodak acts like yore stealing if you want to take your pics off of their site.

Reviews.Title: Rugged Gift for Teenage Girl
Reviews.Author: ramzilla
Reviews.Content: I got this camera as a holliday gift for my 19 year old daughter. She loves it. I purchased it according to a need for durability, indestructibility, and general sturdiness against abuse. Previous bad experience with cameras that have motorized lenses that pop out when energized. All moving lense parts on this camera are contained inside the camera body. Also bought the original Z1 about three years ago for my older daughter & it's still going strong after trips through Europe, South America, & Central America. Now that you can get SD cards that hold up to 2 or 4 gigs, the kids can keep taking pictures until they're fingers get sore. It also has a good battery & power system that allows several days of use before recharging. Wish it had the cool recharger base like the original Z1 had. Oh yeah - my daughters favorite color is Teal - Blue. So it was a no brainer after that.

Reviews.Title: fujifilm camera
Reviews.Author: Melissa Alaiwat "Melissa A"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my daughter but love it myself. It is great quality with extras that other cameras don't have for the price. It takes great pictures and even video and is very small and slender so easy to take along with you. I would recommmend this camera to anyone but I think it is a perfect one for teens.

Reviews.Title: Bad battery
Reviews.Author: Janna L. Kinney
Reviews.Content: My old camera was a Sony cybershot, but instead of getting another one which I was completely happy with, I thought I would try this, because the reviews were better. I have to charge the battery up everytime I use it. It gets run down so fast. I am not a heavy user either. If it was still within my time frame of 30 days I would send it back for sure. I wasn't able to use it for the first few weeks that I had it, because I had to buy a new picture card.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: Karen Cottrell "desert dweller"
Reviews.Content: This camera is easy to use and has excellent handling. Its size is perfect for use while doing any job or project. We have been able to get many pictures that previously we couldn't. We are very satisfied with this camera. We now have 4 digital cameras.

Reviews.Title: Probably could have found a camera better equipped for the money
Reviews.Author: Ryan W. Washington
Reviews.Content: Good camera.  I was looking for something different and I liked how the door slides in the front to turn the camera on and off and the zoom lens doesn't stick out like others.  I was debating betweeen this and the Exilm.  I went Fuji because I figured they have been in the camera and optics industry for a long time and would have the best quality.  The quality seems great.  A few downsides...The viewfinder to take the pictures in the front of the camera in the upper corner is usually where I put my left middle finger so once I found a few pictures taken with my finger in it, I had to remember to keep away.  My girlfriend did the same thing so I know it's not just me.  Also, I was hoping there would be a zoom availible when recording videos, but I don't see this availible.  Lastly, this has a 3x zoom and so does my Cannon, but for some reason my Cannon seems to zoom much further.

Reviews.Title: Everything I wanted/needed and more!
Reviews.Author: Shannon Connor
Reviews.Content: Ever since I started using digital cameras, I have been an avid Fuji devotee.  When my last camera broke from being just dropped once, I knew I needed a durable camera, especially with a lens cover!  This was has delivered from day one with crisp, clear, and vibrant pictures as well as a vast improvement of video quality!!  I could not be happier.  The only thing that was a bit of an adjustment for me was the size - it's so skinny, but that was a small thing to adapt to when there are so many other good things about it!!

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm Finepix Z20fd Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Seth Belt "KS"
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera for the cost. Takes great pictures on the default setting [anti-blur] and the other settings [like beach] work very well. And if you're worried about the slide on front accidentally coming open, it stays more secure than I thought it would but is still very easy to use, especially when you need to take a picture fast. Great camera, and the seller was excellent and shipped it fast as well.

Reviews.Title: Lowered standards?
Reviews.Author: Johnson Mcknight "Monsoonson"
Reviews.Content: Has the world gone mad? Have we lowered our standards when it comes to quality? I mean, I just dont understand why anyone would rate a camera on anything other than PICTURE QUALITY.  A camera is for...get a load of this,,,,taking pictures. It's not for pushing buttons and doing back flips. Just for taking pictures. At least, that's what I think. Anyway, it is MY OPINION that this camera STINKS. Simply put, the pictures come out grainy or out of focus or, grainy and out of focus. GARBAGE. I realize that this is no SLR, but can someone not invent a point-and-shoot that takes a picture that is at least in focus? What year is this again? This is my second try with a point and shoot. So far, I've had no luck. Next up...Canon SD1200.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: B. Smith
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera for the price.  Very easy to use.  I recommend it highly.

Reviews.Title: Reasonable & great camera!
Reviews.Author: Bonnie
Reviews.Content: This camera is compact, fashionable and very user friendly.The movie has clear graphics and sound.

Reviews.Title: Very easy to use
Reviews.Author: Sarah
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use, and gets the job done. I got this 5+ years ago - it still works just fine, and while many phones now have cameras just as good or better, I like being able to keep photos on a SD card without taking up storage on my phone.

Reviews.Title: Satified Customer :D
Reviews.Author: Victoria
Reviews.Content: I got this item for a birthday gift and my sister soooo loves it!!! I also loved that i was able to get the item with the fastdelivery just in time for her birthday too. I am totally satisfied with everything, Thank You So Much!!!

Reviews.Title: My Old Camera
Reviews.Author: AshleyR2011 "Ashley <3"
Reviews.Content: I Have Had This Camera For Over 2 Years Now, When I First Got It, It Was The Best Thing Out...Now..., Im Starting A Photography Page, And It Seems Like This Camera Lacks The "HD" Look When It Comes To Pictures. It Held Up Well Over The Years, But Its Time For A New Camera. The Video Quality Sucks!, So Dont Base Your Buy On That. It Takes Ok Pictures, I Mean It Got Me Started On My Photography...I Would Recommend This For The Average Teenager, Or A Busy Mom Who Doesn't Want To Miss Those Special Moments.

Reviews.Title: Great quality for photos and video-Easy to use
Reviews.Author: C. Aandahl
Reviews.Content: This is a great Camera for a great price(I got it on sale for about $120)It is VERY easy to use and comes with terrific photo editing software.Features include:~Rechargeable battery(charger included)~MANY photo settings(party,inside,outside,close up,time,ZOOM,timer..etc)~Video mode(You will need a SD card for memory)~point and shoot~Anti blur/shakeIt is very small and lightweightI got this camera to replace to Kodak easy share.The Battery lasts a long time on each charge,longer than other cameras I have hadVery nice photo quality and a very reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Overall a good little camera
Reviews.Author: N. L.
Reviews.Content: I have a Canon DSLR camera, which gives me very good quality pictures.  But for those times that I didn't want to carry a big camera around I bought this unit.  Overall it takes pretty good pictures.  Cannot compare to my DLSR, but for a little camera it does the job well.  Just wish the flash was a little stronger for better indoor shots.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Camera
Reviews.Author: Courtney
Reviews.Content: This camera is easy to use, has great battery life & takes beautiful pictures. I bought it last year for my daughter for her birthday and I am completely addicted to it and am getting one for myself for Christmas this year.

Reviews.Title: A decent digital camera
Reviews.Author: Lucia
Reviews.Content: Pros: Great picture quality, Bright LCD, Easy setup, Easy to use,and Comfortable controls.video worked -- wished it would zoom while on video.Great inside, daytime and nighttime photos.

Reviews.Title: Cool Camera
Reviews.Author: Mark A. Mathews "Architect, husband, father, ...
Reviews.Content: Got this camera to replace one for my daughter, who is 17. She loves it for the quality of photos as well as its value as a "fashion accessory".

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Ingry V. Lopez "Ingry Lopez"
Reviews.Content: This camera is very easy to use and very light.  The pictures are so clear.

Reviews.Title: Awful contrast/sharpness
Reviews.Author: Ian
Reviews.Content: This camera is a really trendy camera.  That is about where its merits end in my mind.  The image quality is really soft and fuzzy.  If you want to be seen with a camera, it's the camera for you, but if you want to be seen with great photos, I would recommend the GE E1050 TW.  It's worth the extra money, and it has a touch screen.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: P. G. Eckerstrom "shopper"
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this camera!  It comes in fun colors with other great features, like face detection and red-eye reduction!  Huge monitor screen makes taking pictures easy!  Slide it open to turn it on!  This is a great digital camera! :)

Reviews.Title: GREATT
Reviews.Author: SS "SammyBabe"
Reviews.Content: I had this camera in green until my mother broke it. They don't carry this model in most stores anymore so i found it on here! Better deal, and trying out a new color! The fact that the lens is covered when closed, and that the lens doesn't physically come out of the camera make it great for anyone who drops their camera sometimes

Reviews.Title: best camera i have ever owned...
Reviews.Author: Monique Moreno
Reviews.Content: this is such  GREAT camera... the look of it is beautiful i get a lot of attention with it... everything from this camera is perfect...

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price and features.
Reviews.Author: Adam J. Helgren
Reviews.Content: I sell this, among other cameras at a retail store.  So I knew what I wanted and liked before I purchased this.Canon is pretty much the best, but it lacks a couple of things I wanted, that this camera has, such as a non-telescoping lens, and a dedicated movie button.  The menu system is nice, and relatively easy to navigate, but does kick you out once you make a selection, which can get annoying, especially when first setting it up.The only really big downside for me is the fact that the zoom button isn't by the shutter.  Since it is on the backside of the camera with the screen, it is hard to use one handed.Overall, the pros outweighed the cons.  This isnt the absolute best camera, but for the price, its great, which is why I gave it four, instead of five stars.

Reviews.Title: Worked great for a week.
Reviews.Author: James R. Freeman "Squeezemaster"
Reviews.Content: I bought a Z20 to have handy on my trip to Florida, from which I just returned. I liked the design because of the clever way they eliminated the poorly performing lens covers typical of most P&S; digicams like the Canons. Had two of those die after the warranty ran out because of that "lens error" problem.One other issue I have with this camera is the position of the lens. It is right where you instinctively grab the camera to hold it when picture taking, consequently, it is VERY easy to put a finger in front of the lens by accident.The Z20 took some great pictures but totally died about one week after purchase. Worked great for handheld closeups of flowers with the "anti-blur" feature. At least the Canons worked until the Warranty ran out. The screen took on a weird, mostly black and white streaked effect. Could not view images already taken or view live through the lens. It was not abused or dropped.  Good thing that this was just a pocket camera backup for my Nikon D200. I met someone who had a 10mp Panasonic that looks like a better way to go for a P&S.; I'll be getting a refund for the Z20 and buying a Lumix.

Reviews.Title: Red Eye Red Eye Red Eye
Reviews.Author: Club Traveler
Reviews.Content: For all its features, there is no way to adjust the flash, and anyone with an eye color other than jet black becomes the red-eyed monster in every pic.  Reall poor image quality, even with "face detection and automatic redeye reduction" turned on.  Any flash use washes out everyone.  A terrible camera for indoor shots at dark clubs.  Very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Whoo-hooo I LOVE my camera!
Reviews.Author: Gail
Reviews.Content: I love my new camera and look forward to using the video option.  I just got back my first pics, so clear and sharp.  It is easy to use, the battery is still on its first charge, and even my husband and kids love it.Thanks!

Reviews.Title: A few cons...
Reviews.Author: J. Orsi
Reviews.Content: My older 7 megapixel Fuji F700 took better pictures.Also, bad positioning of the lens as you end up more times than not taking pictures of your fingers in the upper left hand corner.

Reviews.Title: Fancylady
Reviews.Author: Fancylady "Eve"
Reviews.Content: This is a great looking little camera and I love the way it works but the quality of the pictures was iffy. I call Fuji and they had me send it in for recalabration and I am still waiting to receive it back.......

Reviews.Title: Good toy, but bad photos
Reviews.Author: S. Shprung
Reviews.Content: I used the Fujifilm FinePix F30 (6.3MP) camera for few years and like it, but it got old and bit up so I purchase the Finepix Z20fd. It looks cool and the menus are more informative and up to date, but when I start taking photos and compare this 10MP with the older 6.3MP in the same zoom and light the photo quality is a joke; very bad in comparison.If you purchase a camera to take photos, this is not the one.Maybe it is good for videos but I can't recomand it. Sorry.

Reviews.Title: Not that great
Reviews.Author: A. Jones
Reviews.Content: I was so excited about receiving this camera based on other reviews I had read here and elsewhere. Upon receiving it, I was thoroughly disappointed. If you don't have an SD card, it will only hold a handful of pictures. The quality of the photos were not up to par either. I returned the camera and enjoyed my refunded money more.

Reviews.Title: Good Product, Poor Company
Reviews.Author: J. Allen
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera for my son, and it wasn't the model he wanted.  So . . . I returned it to the supplier, SkyBox-USA, after obtaining a Return Authorization Number.  Since I had ordered many times from Amazon in the past, I did not think to check the "Return Policy".  I returned the item in perfect condition, and was charged a 15% restocking fee, as well as the shipping cost.  I expected to pay the shipping cost.  I did not expect to pay a restocking fee.  I feel if a restocking fee is to be charged, it should be clearly stated on the web site, not hidden within pages of other info.  It cost me $34 to learn this lesson.  I will never order from SkyBox again.

ProductInfo.Features:
10-megapixel sensor captures enough detail for photo-quality 18 x 24-inch prints
3x optical zoom with Picture Stabilization; 2.5-inch LCD display
Face Detection optimizes focus/exposure for up to 10 faces; Blog Mode copies 640 x 480 version of image for easy upload
Wirelessly transfer images to IrSimple-equipped devices, including other digital cameras
Stores images on xD or SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Fujifilm Finepix Z20fd 10MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom (Ice Blue)
